::Switchblade::
Switchblade notices the bots arrive, and yells, "Get that escaping 
bot," pointing at Condor. as the seven remaining laser turrets blast 
three times each at Condor just before he reaches the range limit.

On 6 Mar 2001, at 15:35, Yanshosh@... wrote:

> ::Crater/Stratus::
> 
> Crater stopped for a rest, breathing heavily. FOr the past few hours 
> he had been running toward the Black Fortress. In several seconds he 
> resumes his run.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Stratus stops outside the Decepticon base perimiters, watching them 
> fire on some flying bot.
> 
> "Fellow bots," he says into his comm. He wasn't sure if he was using 
> it right, but he hoped he was, "I've come to join you. Can I come 
>
